Client Login

Clients

A few of my favorite clients.

Standard Publishing

A local christian book publisher, Standard Publishing has been in business for over 135 years.
http://standardpub.com/

Lavish Giving

Lavish Giving is a locally owned and operated online gift store that allows you to donate 10% of your putchase to the charity of your choice.
http://www.lavishgiving.com/

Wealth Management Partners LLC

Financial advising and consulting specialists, WMP aims to teach their clients about investing to help them make better decisions.
http://wmpllc.com

BMW Invoice

Gives customers the upper hand in negotiating by giving them both the MSRP and the list price on every model and feature.
http://bmwinvoice.com

iBoomerang.com, Inc.

Online marketing company with amazing customer service. Products include Web Sites, Web Conferencing, Email Templates, and more.
http://iboomerang.com

USA Benefits Group

USABG is a nation wide insurance broker that works with self employed clients and a variety of insurance agencies.
http://usabg.net

Rack n More

Cincinnati area warehouse equipment specalists. Their products and services include consulting, forklifts, pallet rack, carton flow, and more.
http://racknmore.com

Outreach For Animals

A non-profit orginization that educuates people on proper behavior around wildlife.
http://outreachforanimals.org/

Fellowlaborers

The ministry / mentoring / leadership training program I was a part of during 2008-2009.
http://fellowlaborers.org/

Youmans Construction Services

YCS has been in business for over 30 years. They build new homes with an "Owner Involved Builder" approach.
http://buildingmyhome.com/
